name: 4chan - Awesome Smiley
description:
Just a style I decided to make for 4chan. I didn't edit the front page CSS because
1) I thought nobody would care because they never stare at the front page
2) I was too lazy

Feel free to make changes to the CSS and redistribute it as yours (although I wouldn't be hurt by a little credit)! I didn't copy this style from anybody else; I made it from scratch (probably the easiest thing to do).
